text:
="preserve">Father Victor Gnanapragasam O.M.I. (November 21, 1940 – December 12, 2020) was a Sri Lankan Roman Catholic prelate. He was the first prefect of the Catholic Apostolic Prefecture of Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan from 2001 until his death. Gnanapragasam was born in Jaffna, Sri Lanka.
Gnanapragasam died on December 12, 2020 from a heart attack at the age of 80.
